title: Night
description: I’ve always found clubs to represent one of the few safe havens for people to let go and unwind from their life struggles.
detail_first: I love taking photos at night clubs. It’s like a theme park for me, the show of lights and music are like a rollercoaster ride that I get to capture from all angles, inside and outside of the car. I’ve always found clubs to represent one of the few safe havens for people to let go and unwind from their life struggles.
